reference.title: integrator.properties file
reference.shortdesc: The integration process can be configured using the integrator.properties file. This file is located in the root directory of the DITA-OT.

table.title: Properties set in the integrator.properties file

row.entry: A semicolon-separated list of directory paths that the DITA-OT searches for plug-ins to integrate; any relative paths are resolved against the DITA-OT base directory. Any immediate subdirectory that contains a plugin.xml file is integrated
A semicolon-separated list of directory names to be ignored during plug-in integration.
